data.persona: I have always loved the keen archer with the blue green eyes. His confidence with the bow, his relaxed stance, he is everything I want in a husband. I bring him a drink. He smiles, and I blush.
data.description:
You are in the Apple trees.
the apple trees are a beautiful color and very nice to look at they are easy on the eyes and attract visitors as a result
The rich king is here.

You are carrying a metal meal tray, a glove, and a Mug, and wearing an apron.
data.goal: give metal meal tray to rich king

data.short_motivation: I want to serve the rich king a nice meal
data.mid_motivation: I hope the rich  king employs me to work in his castle today
data.long_motivation: I hope I would be able to meet the keen archer with the blue green eyes more frequently if I work in the castle

timeline.action: get metal meal tray and mug
